div.p: It appears your email has not been verified. Click here to send a verification email allowing you to participate to the forum.
Congratulations! Your email has just been validated. You may now participate to our forums.

div.t-attf-class: btn-group btn-block mb16 #{(user.karma < forum.karma_ask) and 'karma_required' or ''}

span.t-attf-class: pull-right label #{tag and tag.name == question_tag.name and 'label-primary' or 'label-default'}

t.p: Sorry, this question is not available anymore.
Share an awesome link. Your post will appear in the 'Newest' top-menu. If the community vote on your post, it will get traction by being promoted in the homepage.
We keep a high level of quality in showcased posts, around 20% of the submited posts will be featured.
To improve your chance getting an answer:

ul.li: Set a clear, explicit and concise question title (check bad examples and good examples ),
Provide enough details and, if possible, give an example.

div.h5: Please enter a descriptive question (should finish by a '?')

t.p: If you close this post, it will be hidden for most users. Only users having a high karma can see closed posts to moderate them.

template.p: Please try to give a substantial answer. If you wanted to comment on the question or answer, just use the commenting tool. Please remember that you can always revise your answers - no need to answer the same question twice. Also, please don't forget to vote - it really helps to select the best questions and answers!

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary mt16 #{not question.can_answer and 'karma_required' or ''}

a.t-attf-class: vote_up fa fa-caret-up no-decoration #{post.user_vote == 1 and 'text-success' or ''} #{((post.user_vote == 1 and not post.can_downvote) or not post.can_upvote) and 'karma_required' or ''}
vote_down fa fa-caret-down no-decoration #{post.user_vote == -1 and 'text-warning' or ''} #{((post.user_vote == -1 and not post.can_upvote) or not post.can_downvote) and 'karma_required' or ''}
favourite_question no-decoration fa fa-2x fa-star #{question.user_favourite and 'forum_favourite_question' or ''}

p.b: The has been closed for reason:

a.t-attf-class: fa fa-comment-o #{not question.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}

div.t-if: question.post_type != 'question' or question.post_type == 'question' and not question.uid_has_answered and question.state != 'close' and question.active != False

div.span: (only one answer per question is allowed)

a.t-attf-class: accept_answer fa fa-2x fa-check-circle no-decoration #{answer.is_correct and 'oe_answer_true' or 'oe_answer_false'} #{not answer.can_accept and 'karma_required' or ''}
fa fa-comment-o #{not answer.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}
fa fa-comment-o #{not answer.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}
